summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Walden Street to Genesee Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1857 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
